#Description of feeds (v1)

= Introduction =

CIF has the capability to [ServerInstall_v1#Enabling_Feed_Generation generate feeds] of threat intelligence from the ingested threat intelligence. Feeds are generated by type, assessment and confidence. 

Type:

 * infrastructure (IP address or CIDR notation)
 * domain
 * url
 * email
 * search
 * malware

Assessment:

 * Botnet
 * Email
 * Fastflux
 * Malware
 * Phishing
 * Scanners
 * Spam
 * Spamvertising
 * Suspicious
 * Whitelists

Confidence:

 *
